data.title: FC Barcelona Handbol
data.meta_description:
In the CL final 4. And already champions of La Liga plus 3 other trophies.

Keep going.

A joy to watch this team. As a handball fan they are delightfull.
data.text:
True. A strong team but still not as strong as the other 2.

It would be nice to meet Veszprem in the final. I don't like that the Final 4 is played in Germany. Home ground is a massive and unfair advantage for german teams. Kiel would have 10.000 fans + in an eventual final with Barca.

That was the best possible draw.

It would be nice to meet Veszprem in the final. I don't like that the Final 4 is played in Germany. Home ground is a massive and unfair advantage for german teams. Kiel would have 10.000 fans + in an eventual final with Barca.

Yes, it's definitely a significant advantage for German teams which the results since 2009 also prove.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/EHF_Champions_League

They should introduce the two leg format (home and away) again. More exciting and more fair IMO. Money talks though. I don't follow handball that close but I can imagine that the Final 4 is good business for the various federations and sponsors.

33-28! Yeah.

Balanced game because the referee joked with Karabatic . Several wrong decisions against the French. In the second part he just attacked up to 10m final . This factor more Saric made ​​a difference of course . What monster is Karabatic . Best in the world without a doubt . Attack and defend like nobody else. Saric must have been the starter. Vargas is good but does not have the quality of Saric who remains top 3 worldwide .

Playing Veszprem in the final. Not a surprise IMO, the hungarians have an amazing team. I can see it going either way tbh, but I'm hoping our star players will show up in this game.

Playing Veszprem in the final. Not a surprise IMO, the hungarians have an amazing team. I can see it going either way tbh, but I'm hoping our star players will show up in this game.

50/50. I hope Rutenka stops fucking up. He´s a massive player but has not been at his level this season.
